attributes.action: 6 weeks holidays needs to be lowered to 4 weeks
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s to long of a break for children they become bored and out of routine! They need routine! It’s also too long for working parents to have to find childcare for the whole 6 weeks it’s expensive
attributes.background: To put 6 weeks holidays to 4 weeks out a week of the 6 weeks at the Christmas holidays and a week on another half term
